project_abstract.cdata: The project will assist the government in increasing agricultural production and farmer's incomes by strengthening institutions that provide support services to farmers.  The project will:  (a) strengthen agriculture, animal husbandry and animal and plant quarantine management capability through improved information, computer networking and monitoring and evaluation systems; (b) reorganize crop and livestock extension systems from national to county level; (c) improve extension services by providing facilities, upgrading skills of technical staff and improving their recommendations through farm-level demand-driven research programs; (d) reorganize seed centers to separate their production from certification and regulation roles and promote seed commercialization; (e) strengthen veterinary and preventive animal health services, establish a well-coordinated national breed improvement program, and tighten pharmaceutical, agrochemical and feed quality control; and (f) promote cost recovery for services provided to farmers.  The project will also strengthen project management at all levels by providing facilities, training and technical assistance.

P003559.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>农业支持服务项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将协助中国政府通过增强向农民提供支持服务机构的能力，增加农业生产和农民收入。项目将：（1）通过完善信息、计算机网络以及监测评价体系，增强农业、畜牧业和植物检疫管理能力；（2）重组中央至县级农技推广和畜牧技术推广系统；（3）通过建设设施、提升技术人员技能、借助农村需求驱动型研究完善技术人员提出的建议等措施，改善技术推广服务；（4）重组种子中心，使其生产职能与认证和监管职能分开，推动种子行业商业化；（5）加强收益服务和预防性动物卫生服务，建立协调良好的国家育种改良项目，加强药品、农用化学品及饲料质量控制；（6）促进向农民所提供服务的成本回收。本项目也将通过提供设施、培训和技术援助增强各级部门的项目管理能力。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
